body: Can you merge https://github.com/ctiller/grpc/tree/memleak into this, so that the test case that demonstrates the leak goes in atomically with this?

Still some failures.

FAILED: bins/asan/api_fuzzer_one_entry test/core/end2end/fuzzers/api_fuzzer_corpus/543b21694b4f7f9d529fd34c69fb5cde6721ae2e
